mapper.sql: PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.PROJECT_PROGRESS_ID as PROJECT_PROGRESS_ID ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.OPERATOR as OPERATOR ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.BUILD_YEAR as BUILD_YEAR ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.BUILDING_PROJECT as BUILDING_PROJECT ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.PLANNING_NAME as PLANNING_NAME ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.ACTUAL_NAME as ACTUAL_NAME ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.PLANNING_LONGITUDE as PLANNING_LONGITUDE ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.PLANNING_LATITUDE as PLANNING_LATITUDE ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.ACTUAL_LONGITUDE as ACTUAL_LONGITUDE ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.ACTUAL_LATITUDES as ACTUAL_LATITUDES ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.PROVINCE as PROVINCE ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.CITY as CITY ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.COUNTY as COUNTY ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.REGIONS as REGIONS ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.ON_SITE_SUPERVISION as ON_SITE_SUPERVISION ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.PROFESSION_PEOPLE as PROFESSION_PEOPLE ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.DISTRICT_HEAD as DISTRICT_HEAD ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.OVERLAY_SCENE as OVERLAY_SCENE ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.SKY_BRANCH_ID as SKY_BRANCH_ID ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.MACHINE_ROOM_ID as MACHINE_ROOM_ID ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.ELECTRIC_POWER_ID as ELECTRIC_POWER_ID ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.MAIN_EQUIPMENT_ID as MAIN_EQUIPMENT_ID ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.AIR_CONDITIONER_ID as AIR_CONDITIONER_ID ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.FIRE_ID as FIRE_ID ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.POWER_MONITORING_ID as POWER_MONITORING_ID ,PROJECT_PROGRESS_DEGREE.REMAKE as REMAKE
mapper.select:
select p.project_progress_id,p.operator,p.build_year,p.building_project, p.planning_name,p.actual_name, p.planning_longitude,p.planning_latitude,p.actual_longitude, p.actual_latitudes,p.province, p.city,p.county,p.regions,p.on_site_supervision,p.profession_people, p.district_head,p.overlay_scene, sky.construction_mode,sky.basic_type,sky.foundation_construction_name, sky.basic_unit_contacts, sky.foundation_progress_name,sky.curing_start_date, sky.sky_branch_type_name,sky.sky_branch_supplier_name,sky.sky_branch_supplier_contacts, sky.sky_branch_unit_name,sky.sky_construction_unit_contacts,sky.sky_branch_height, sky.sky_branch_progress_name,sky.sky_branch_completion_date, mr.machine_room_construction_mode,mr.machine_room_type_name, mr.machine_room_construction_name,mr.civil_engineering_contacts, mr.machine_room_schedule,mr.machine_room_end_time, mr.machine_room_decorate_name,mr.decoration_unit_contacts, mr.machine_room_adorn,mr.machine_room_decorate_end_time, ep.electric_construction_mode,ep.electric_type, ep.electric_unit_name,ep.electric_unit_contacts, ep.electric_progress,ep.electric_completion_date, me.equipment_construction_mode,me.equipment_type_name, me.equipment_supplier_name,me.equipment_supplier_contacts, me.equipment_unit_name,me.equipment_unit_contacts, me.equipment_progress,me.equipment_completion_date, ac.air_construction_mode,ac.conditioning_brand_name,ac.specification_type_name, ac.air_unit_name,ac.air_construction_contacts,ac.air_progress,ac.air_completion_date, ff.fire_construction_mode,ff.hand_held_number,ff.spraying_method_number, ff.fire_supplier_name,ff.fire_supplier_contacts, ff.installation_unit_name,ff.Installation_unit_contacts, ff.fire_progress,ff.fire_completion_date, pm.power_construction_mode,pm.power_supplier_name, pm.power_supplier_contacts,pm.power_unit_name,pm.power_unit_contacts, pm.power_progress,pm.power_completion_date,p.remake from project_progress_degree p left join Sky_branch_degree sky on p.sky_branch_id = sky.sky_branch_id left join machine_room_degree mr on p.machine_room_id = mr.machine_room_id left join electric_power_degree ep on p.electric_power_id = ep.electric_power_id left join main_equipment_degree me on p.main_equipment_id = me.main_equipment_id left join Air_conditioner_degree ac on p.air_conditioner_id = ac.air_conditioner_id left join fire_fighting_device_degree ff on p.fire_id = ff.fire_id left join power_monitoring_degree pm on p.power_monitoring_id = pm.power_monitoring_id where p.project_progress_id in
#{projectProgressId}
